title: can someone help me
body: After champ select is done and we start loading in the game my client closes so i can't message people in game and i cant receive their message, but when my game ends and click the button it starts to start up and loads the client again and our match information. Can someone tell me whats wrong. It ends the client and i cant /whisper or /msg. I can only do that after the match and league client started up again

replies.body: Once champion select ends and you enter the game, the actual League client will minimize and you won't be able to browse the store or chat with your friends through the client. If you're trying to talk to people on your friend list while in a match, you can always use the /whisper (insert name here) to talk to them.
